meanings.definition: The most common isotope of hydrogen, having one proton and no neutrons.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study protiums to learn more about atoms.
meanings.sent2: Protiums are essential for understanding the structure of elements.
meanings.sent3: The protiums at the science fair were the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: In the world of tiny particles, protiums shine like bright stars.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of protiums makes them fascinating to explore.

meanings.sent1: The lab assistant carefully labeled the vials containing protiums.
meanings.sent2: Protiums are often used in scientific experiments for their stability.
meanings.sent3: The protiums in the container seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: Among all the isotopes, protiums stand out like a group of friends.
meanings.sent5: The collection of protiums sparkled like precious gems under the microscope.
